# delegate

**Instance Property**

The player view’s delegate object.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any AVPlayerViewDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Setting the delegate object

- **AVPlayerViewDelegate**: A protocol that defines the methods to implement to participate in the player view’s full-screen presentation life cycle.
